personal.name: Shubham Pramod Zanzad
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.bio: I am a Software Engineer specializing in backend and full-stack development, with experience building distributed, event-driven systems. Currently at Verse Innovation, I work on scalable log ingestion pipelines, API performance optimization, and GenAI-powered workflows like Natural Language to SQL systems used in production. I enjoy owning features end-to-end — from API design and data pipelines to debugging and performance tuning in production. With a strong foundation in data structures and systems, I’m passionate about building reliable backend platforms that scale and solve real business problems.

education.institution: International Institute of Information Technology, Bangalore (IIIT B)

responsibilities: Built and maintained distributed full-stack systems using FastAPI, Kafka, MySQL, React, Tailwind, and Fuse, delivering end-to-end features, fixing production bugs, and translating user requirements into scalable services.
Reduced API latency by ~30–35% by refactoring slow code paths, introducing in-memory caching, and optimizing SQL schemas and queries, improving throughput for high-volume log queries.
Designed a GenAI-driven log ingestion pipeline that auto-generates Grok patterns and log schemas from raw logs, eliminating manual parsing and accelerating onboarding of new log sources.

Implemented a Natural Language to SQL querying system using LLMs, enabling users to query logs conversationally, supported by automated log table profiling and schema generation workflows for accurate query translation.
Developed a Go-based code evaluation webhook integrated with SonarQube, on every merge request and reducing production defects by 25%.
Built an HNSW-based recommendation pipeline serving ~12% of feed traffic on the JOSH app, improving content discovery at production scale.
Created a daily ETL validation pipeline} comparing training vs prediction datasets and publishing discrepancy alerts, improving ML data reliability and monitoring.
Implemented a cloud monitoring service for GCP buckets to track SST file generation and trigger real-time alerts on missing files, preventing downstream data failures.

projects.name: MediSync - Healthcare Portal
description: Developed a healthcare portal for health record transfers using ABDM APIs and FHIR standards in a microservices architecture, used RabbitMQ for inter-service communication.
Designed Figma mockups, built backend APIs with Spring Boot, frontend with React.js, and contributed to database schema design.
Enabled real-time updates with Server-Sent Events, inter-service communication with RabbitMQ, and secure access using JWT-based authorization and authentication and role-based access control.

projects.name: LeagueFit - DevOps Project
description: Developed a web application recommending top five football clubs using cosine similarity.
Created Jenkins CI/CD pipeline, configured Ansible playbook, managed Docker containers with Docker Compose, and set up ELK Stack for monitoring and logging.
Developed using FastAPI and Streamlit, containerizing it into separate backend, frontend, and dataset containers.

projects.name: CLI-Based Course Registration System
description: Developed a multithreaded course registration system with concurrency control via file-locking mechanisms, handling concurrent socket-based client requests using process synchronization techniques.

achievements: Secured All India Rank of 1517 in GATE CSE 2023
Solved over 600+ coding problems across various platforms: LeetCode, Codeforces, CodeChef, Coding Ninjas, and GeeksForGeeks
